description: User completes the onboarding flow and is redirected to dashboard (conversion event)
User successfully creates an account (conversion event - top of funnel)
User successfully logs into their account
User connects a social media account (Instagram, etc.) - conversion/activation event
User disconnects a social media account (churn indicator)
User creates/schedules a new post via editorial modal (key activation event)
User reschedules an existing post by drag-and-drop
User generates AI content ideas (engagement with AI features)

User uploads media to the media library (engagement event)

Authentication error occurred during login or signup (error tracking)
Social media integration connection failed (error tracking)
User data synced with backend after profile update
